sentences.en: Some people believe that sex education leads to promiscuity in young people.
sentences.cn: 有些人相信性教育导致年轻人滥交。

sentences.en: In fact, bonobo promiscuity seems to be an example of this.
sentences.cn: 事实上倭黑猩猩的混交行为便是佐证。

sentences.en: If there existed a Hall of Fame promiscuity he would have surely been inducted on his first try.
sentences.cn: 如果不是因为名人堂存在着混乱，那么他的第一次尝试就应该入选了。
